column4: after upgrading to gutsy, my keyboard's right alt key no longer works... i used to have the shortcut of alt and + to maximize a window, but now it only works if I use my left alt... any ideas?
did you check the keyboard shortcuts in System > Preferences > Keyboard Shortcuts ?

apparently it seems to be seeming with a "third level" on keyboards introduced in to gutsy: http://www.pcworld.com/article/id,130923-page,1-c,linux/article.html ... but i don't use gnome to follow these instructions to fix it
